<br />
在閱讀的同時，因為虛擬貨幣種類很多，超級無敵雜。<br />
<br />
<br />
畢竟我也是新手，通常會用我文章中的水龍頭，<br />
<br />
<br />
去更換成 <b>比特幣(BTC)、以太幣(ETH)、萊特幣(LTC)</b> 等等 ...<br />
<br />
<br />
虛擬貨幣列表。（通常換十大幣會比較保險）<br />
<br />
<br />
這邊附上<br />
<div>
<br />
Coinmarketcap 的連結網址：<a href="https://coinmarketcap.com/" target="_blank">點我</a>　<b>（無推薦碼等廣告）</b></div>
<div>
Coingecko 幣虎：<a href="https://www.coingecko.com/zh-tw" target="_blank">點我</a> <b>（無推薦碼等廣告）</b></div>
<div>
<b><br /></b></div>
<div>
========================================================== </div>
<h2>
1.BitoPro</h2>
<div>
先介紹第一個虛擬貨幣交易所　<b>BitoPro</b></div>
<div>
因為這間交易所是由 BitoEX (幣託) 後來開的，</div>
<div>
那用台灣的交易所目的就是要 台幣入金。</div>
<div>
<strike></strike><br /></div>
<div>
我認為是還不錯用啦，還在成長中。</div>
<div>
<br /></div>
<div>
註冊／看看：<a href="https://www.bitopro.com/landing_pages/reward?referrer=9602608403" target="_blank">點我</a>　<b>（有推薦碼）</b></div>
<div>
<br /></div>
<span style="color: #b06400;">因註冊需要 認證身分證 之類的，請使用前自行斟酌。</span><br />
<h4>
入金證明：</h4>
<div>
<a href="http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vbtG0_VCFqc/XKBBgXAzD-I/AAAAAAAAFIg/GK13rTSU2yAZN-vAceIK5mbzfDPfjhkvwCK4BGAYYCw/s1600/%25E8%25A8%25BB%25E8%25A7%25A3%2B2019-03-31%2B122625.jpg" imageanchor="1"><img border="0" height="144" src="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vbtG0_VCFqc/XKBBgXAzD-I/AAAAAAAAFIg/GK13rTSU2yAZN-vAceIK5mbzfDPfjhkvwCK4BGAYYCw/s640/%25E8%25A8%25BB%25E8%25A7%25A3%2B2019-03-31%2B122625.jpg" width="640" /></a></div>
<div>
<span style="color: #666666;"></span><br /></div>
<div>
<b><span style="color: #999999;">&nbsp;小投一點四千。</span></b></div>
<div>
<b><span style="color: #999999;">目前有小賺一點點 .. 一千多吧？</span></b></div>
<div>

出金證明：<span style="color: #b06400;"></span></h4>
<h4>

<h2>
2.Binance</h2>
<h4>
入金證明：</h4>
<h2>
<img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," /></h2>
</div>
<div>
<div>
<h4>
出金證明：</h4>
<b style="-webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;">&nbsp;<img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," /></b><br />
<br />
<br />
<b style="-webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;">這間交易所非常有名，全球 TOP1 吧？&nbsp;</b><br />
<b style="-webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;">不過他不能法幣交易，就是沒辦法使用台幣進行交易。</b><br />
<b style="-webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;">完全是""國際交易所""，是使用 USDT / USDC / ... 等，人民幣也沒辦法</b><br />
<b style="-webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;">有提供信用卡儲值（但手續費太高不建議）</b><br />
<br />
<b style="-webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;">入金方式的話，我是使用 BitoPro 購買 LTC 萊特幣 轉至 幣安。 </b><br />
<br />
<b style="-webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;">註冊 / 看看：<a href="https://www.binance.com/?ref=28933503" target="_blank">點我</a> ( 含推薦碼 )</b><br />
<br />
<b style="-webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;"> 有任何註冊問題在左方有我為這個部落格創造的Line 粉絲團唷！</b><br />
<b style="-webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;">歡迎來跟我聊聊！ </b><br />
<br />
========================================================== </div>
